TOKENWARP.WallsCancelTokenAnimationHint: When checked and the GM drags tokens over scene walls, the tokens appear at their destinations instantly (no token movement animations). This setting helps GMs to not reveal map areas not meant to be seen by their players (will not have any effect if the token movement animation is OFF).
TOKENWARP.DefaultTokenAnimationSwitchNam: No token movement animations by default.
TOKENWARP.DefaultTokenAnimationSwitchHin: When checked, the tokens appear at their destinations instantly (no token movement animations).
TOKENWARP.ExcludedScenesHint: Add Scene UUIDs (or IDs) separated by semicolons (;). Token movement animations always ON.
TOKENWARP.DefaultTokenAnimationSpeedHint: Default is 6. Foundry v10 was using a default of 12.
TOKENWARP.TokenAnimationSwitchHint: Default: Foundry token movement animations. Walls block: only when Core 'Unconstrained movement' is ON, crossing walls disables movement animation for that move; if Core unconstrained movement is OFF, Walls block has no extra effect. No movement animations: movement animation is disabled by default.
TOKENWARP.DefaultOutOfBoundsBehaviourHin: Limit token movement to scene boundaries by clamping the destination to the nearest valid point. Movement keeps animation unless 'No movement animations' is active.
TOKENWARP.WarnMultipleRulersActive: Token Warp: Please use either Elevation Ruler or Drag Ruler modules. Both are currently enabled
